europeana:record.dc:title: Revisionary notes on the subfamily Homolobinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Hymenoptera; Braconidae; Homolobinae; Homolobus; Indo-Australian; Indonesia; New Guinea; Australia; distribution; key
europeana:record.dc:description: Two new species of the genus Homolobus Foerster, 1862, one from Lombok, Java, the other from New Guinea, are described. The genus Westwoodiella Szépligeti, 1904, is redescribed and illustrated; the new tribe Westwoodiellini is created to include it in the subfamily Homolobinae. Rogas pectoralis Herrich-Schäffer, 1838 is synonymized with Homolobus discolor (Wesmael, 1835) syn. nov., and R. simplex Herrich-Schäffer, 1838 with Homolobus annulicornis (Nees, 1834) syn. nov. Homolobus simplex (Watanabe, 1932) nee Herrich-Schäffer, 1838 is renamed as H. watanabei nom. nov.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Revisionary notes on the subfamily Homolobinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 66) (Issue 25)
